title: Harvard’s defiance of Trump’s ‘authoritarian incursion’ supported by 60 past and present college and university presidents
description: Harvard president Alan Garber refused demands made by the Trump admin, which said it will freeze more than $2 billion in grants in response.
author: Former and current college and university presidents
byline: Former and current college and university presidents
